backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers plus CSS variables defining light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the app and loading the main TypeScript entry module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling routing, rendering pages, and including header and footer.
frontend/src/branding/theme.ts: Brand configuration exporting site name, logo path, and healthcareâ€‘themed color palette.
frontend/src/components/CategoryCard.tsx: Category card UI with optional photo, icon fallback handling, and hover animations.
frontend/src/components/ContactDetails.t: Renders phone, email, and address details in compact or detailed variants.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with logo, quick links, contact info, and attribution section.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with logo, navigation links, scroll effects, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, headline, and call-to-action buttons including navigation to contact and phone link.
frontend/src/components/ImageGallery.tsx: Responsive image grid that hides images failing to load using local error tracking.
frontend/src/components/Logo.tsx: Displays brand logo with fallback initials and name if the logo image fails.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Wrapper component that renders a padded section with container styling.
frontend/src/content/categories.ts: Defines category objects for ICU, OT, furniture, and lab setups with descriptions and image metadata.
frontend/src/content/contact.ts: Exports basic contact information including phone, email, and address.
frontend/src/content/icuSetup.ts: Lists grouped ICU setup requirements across equipment, furniture, and construction.
frontend/src/content/otSetup.ts: Lists basic OT setup requirement items.
frontend/src/content/productGalleries.ts: Exports gallery image arrays for hospital furniture and laboratory setups.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity with login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light and dark themes with typography enhancements.
frontend/src/lib/router.ts: Implements a simple history-based router with navigation, subscriptions, and scroll restoration.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the root app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page section describing the company with feature blocks and overview text.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact section with a title, description, and detailed contact info component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Simple page that displays the Hero component.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays product categories and detailed sections for ICU setup, OT setup, and galleries using various content sources and components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing goals, requirements, known issues, and existing features for the Predicta Healthcare website.
